smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'EditorFragment' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'DateTime' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onDrawOver appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (requestCode and REQUEST_AUTHENTICATION) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: requestCode and REQUEST_AUTHENTICATION
Parentheses in (requestCode and REQUEST_PICK) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: requestCode and REQUEST_PICK
Parentheses in (width / -2f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width / -2f
Parentheses in (dateTime[DateTime.YEAR] * 1000) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dateTime[DateTime.YEAR] * 1000
Parentheses in (child.y + child.height) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: child.y + child.height

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.
The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function upload defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function setStatus defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Hba1c defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class Glucose defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
